thread.title: Location, Quality, Amenities Can't Be Matched
thread.title_full: Location, Quality, Amenities Can't Be Matched - Review of Hotel Parc St. Severin - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: langeleer
title: Location, Quality, Amenities Can't Be Matched
text: Overall, a great stay after much research prior to making my choice. I was not able to reach the hotel via email or via their online contact form prior to my stay to arrange some things which had me un-easy with my choice in this hotel. However, being welcomed to the hotel with much warmth and hospitality by the staff after a long flight, and the high quality and rich amenities of the hotel made up for any pre-stay mishaps. Would highly recommend the hotel and hope they resolve the inability to email or utilize their online contact form for pre-stay arrangements. Hope to visit again soon!
